ABOUTUS3: BonBon offers a wide range of bath and body care products. BonBon was established to reinforce the use of wholesome and natural ingredients to nourish the skin from inside out. Our products are made from scratch, formulated from organic & essential oils, and are free from harsh chemicals. Our line includes facial, body and hair care products.Our philosophy is what you put on your body is just as important as what you put inside your body!
